# Load Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lme4)
library(psych)
```


# Read data
```{r}
teams <- read_csv("mlm_teams.csv")
```




# describe data
```{r}
describe(teams)
```




```{r}
# Risk is fixed and team_id is random.

mod <- lmer(score ~ risk + (1|team_id), REML = TRUE, data = teams)
summary(mod)

```
